mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.description, t1.module, t1.time_taken, t1.ip, t1.address, t1.browser, t1.os, t1.status, t1.error_msg, t1.create_user, t1.create_time, t2.nickname AS createUserString FROM t_sys_log AS t1 LEFT JOIN t_sys_user AS t2 ON t2.id = t1.create_user ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t1.id, t1.description, t1.module, t1.time_taken, t1.ip, t1.address, t1.browser, t1.os, t1.status, t1.error_msg, t1.create_user, t1.create_time, t2.nickname AS createUserString FROM t_sys_log AS t1 LEFT JOIN t_sys_user AS t2 ON t2.id = t1.create_user ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_sys_log) AS pvCount, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ip) FROM t_sys_log) AS ipCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_sys_log WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURRENT_DATE) AS todayPvCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_sys_log WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURRENT_DATE - 1) AS yesterdayPvCount

SELECT DATE(create_time) AS date, COUNT(1) AS pvCount, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS ipCount FROM t_sys_log WHERE DATE(create_time) != CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY DATE(create_time) DESC LIMIT #{days}

SELECT module, COUNT(1) AS pvCount, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(create_time) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS todayPvCount, SUM(CASE WHEN DATE(create_time) = CURRENT_DATE - 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS yesterdayPvCount FROM t_sys_log WHERE module != '验证码' AND module != '登录' GROUP BY module ORDER BY pvCount DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT CASE WHEN POSITION(' ' IN address) > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(address FROM 1 FOR POSITION(' ' IN address) - 1) ELSE address END AS name, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) AS value FROM t_sys_log GROUP BY name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10
